commit.message:
Operator sdk 1.3.2 (#1221)

* Migrate to operator-sdk v1.3.2

- All Controller implementations are now in the `controllers` package. Package level vars refactored so that no conflicts occur. Controller methods refactored to use `<control-type>Request` which wraps `<control-type>Reconciler>` and adds request specific fields.
- All `*Reconciler` initialisation moved to `SetupWithManager` methods.
- Controllers refactored to always use  the `context.Context` passed to `Reconcile`.
- RBAC annotations added to relevant controllers so that roles are
  automatically generated.
- Makefile updated to use latest operator-sdk structure.
- Migrated to OLM bundle format. 'olm/' dir removed.
- Remove 'deploy/' dir
- Remove old/redundant scripts in 'build/' and replace with 'scripts/'
- Remove unused cekit modules
- Replace all Docker files use with single root Dockerfile
- Utilise go-get-tool to resolve all build/script dependencies

Co-Authored-by: Vittorio Rigamonti <vrigamon@redhat.com>

* Added namespace during startup

* Check for userSecret == nil

* Launcher fix

Co-authored-by: Vittorio Rigamonti <vrigamon@redhat.com>
